title: Overseer.Exit.Success1
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
You brought the exact amount we asked for
nothing more?
Well you technically did make quota...
but no extra food for you
bring back more next time
<<completeCaveExitDialog CaveExit>>

title: Overseer.Exit.Failure1
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
Unacceptable! None of you get anything!
You can let your hunger motivate you!!
<<completeCaveExitDialog CaveExit>>

title: Overseer.Exit.Success2
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
That's a satisfactory amount of crystal
you could always bring up more
I think we can spare an extra food portion
but no matter, you'll be back tomorrow
<<completeCaveExitDialog CaveExit>>

title: Overseer.Exit.Success3
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
You brought up a decent amount.
A little more than quota
It could always be more
but I think we can give you a little extra food
Three whole portions!
<<completeCaveExitDialog CaveExit>>

title: Overseer.Exit.Success4
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
Hmmm Industrious today are we?
I'd really prefer it if you brought up a little more
but I'm feeling generous this time
four extra food portions!!
<<completeCaveExitDialog CaveExit>>

title: Overseer.Exit.Success5
body:
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
Ah do my eyes decive me?
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_silent>>
Is this enough for you asshole?
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
Oh my! yes
you should bring this much up every time
you'd make me very rich!
I think we can give you...
FIVE, yes. FIVE extra portions.
<<completeCaveExitDialog CaveExit>>

title: Overseer.StartGame
body:
<<disablePlayerMovement DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
Welcome to your new life!
Every day you and your...
...comrades
will descend the cave and bring me crystal.
Teams are 6 large, with one channeler
that's you
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_silent>>
That's me?
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
...
yes
...anyway. Teams are 6. 
You can choose who gets to carry the crystals and who gets to mine
Walk over to the equip station to outfit your team
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_silent>>
You mean the shed with the big "equip" sign on it?
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
...
yes
We can not start a work day unless you are equipped with at least one pickaxe and one bag
We'll start you off with an easy quota
but expect that quota to go up
Other than that...well...
"good luck"
<<enablePlayerMovement DialogAndPortraitContainer>>

title: Overseer.DayTwoTutorial
body:
<<disablePlayerMovement DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer overseer_default_talking>>
<<disableAutoCam SceneShotController>>
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController OpeningShot>>
Wake up!
Before you start mining for me today I have a few things to inform you about
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController FoodShackShot>>
Over here is the food hut
if you bring me more crystals, I'll feed you more
It's pretty simple.
You can decide which of your squad mates eat and how many portions they get
So think about who deserves to eat!
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController UpgradeShackShot>>
Next is the Upgrades shop
Every day you can upgrade one piece of equipment
The better the equipment, the more productive you'll be!
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController TunnelShot>>
When you are ready to mine my crystal, walk to the work tunnel.
<<changeSceneShot SceneShotController OpeningShot>>
That's it. 
"Good Luck"
<<enableAutoCam SceneShotController>>
<<enablePlayerMovement DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
